notes.body:
Javascript’s ‘this’ Keyword
 ‘this’ is like a pronoun.
Follows the antecedent. 
When a function is executed, it gets the this property. A variable with the value of the object that invokes the function where this is used.
this always refers to an object.
Usually used inside of a function or a method.
**When strict mode is being used, this holds the value undefined in both global functions and in anonymous functions that are not bound to any objects.**

Treehouse Forum Regex
user$ - matches usernames which end with user
^user - matches usernames which begin with user
(user|name) - ‘or’ in Regex is a single |.
/^gr(a|e)y$/ - will accept either grey or gray.
var expression = new Regexp /^gr(a|e)y$/
OR
var expression = /^gr(a|e)y$/i;
Modifiers
	* Make it possible to modify the RegEx*
	* i - Makes it case insensitive
	* + - Allows you to add symbols.
	* g - global
	[a-z]{6,8} - Makes it so that the password can be any letter between 6-8 characters in length.

All Sass files end in scss
You run Sass from the command line.
sass - watch - will automatically compile sass as you work. It creates a css file and then compiles directly into that css file as soon as you save the sass file.
Libsass is a variant of Sass that can be ported into other programming languages.
Whenever you see an &, it is basically doing something extra in the tag it is nested within.

W3 Schools SQL
Syntax
	* SQL is NOT case-sensitive.
	* In some SQL langs, you need a semicolon at the end.

Why PRY is 100x's better than IRB. There are so many cool things that PRY is able to do. Maybe I should just submit a pull request to the Rails project to make this the default in Rails.

Ruby style guide. I am not sure if my ruby code looks as nice as this ruby code, but this is definitely a good reference. Maybe I should read this through before presentations. Oh wait, our whole project is in JavaScript!
